name: Driver Bus Skill Challenge
description:
Driver Bus Skill Challenge is total amazing bus simulation driving game. Press paddle to move, accelerate, brake, stop and avoid obstacle & obstructions crashing. Drive local bus among the split cities. Complex interiors and tinted windows are good for the passenger comfort. Realistic missions of parking, gain the driving experience and become the legend of the city roads and boulevards.
Features:
• Awesome graphics
• Realistic sound system
• Different buses
• Exciting stages
• Interesting game play
